message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be very valuable to you. I'm willing to part with it for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still unable to meet at $17,000. I propose $15,000 as my maximum offer.
